lines.text: He haunts my thoughts like a dreadful ghost!

[about Jasper]
When I'm dressed, I feel as if he were looking through the wall at me!

[addressing her students]
Ladies, a crisis is a test of breeding. Remember you're Britains!

[to Neville]
Tomorrow you're my pupil, but today you are my guest.

[Awakening from his stupor]
What was I doing?
Stranglin' me! You can't go around stranglin' people without payin' for it!
Mr. Neville, In my presence two nights ago did you or did you not raise a knife against my Ned?
Captain, there's been a miscarriage of justice!
Impossible. I've never left my desk.
